title: Deadly Desire
description: In this Dateline classic, after a Idaho woman falls in love with her married boss, the affair leads to a violent confrontation. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 3, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
